statements: SELECT * FROM temperature_control ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT batch_id, temperature FROM temperature_control WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM temperature_control WHERE batch_id = 101
SELECT * FROM temperature_control WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT batch_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_control ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM temperature_control WHERE batch_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT batch_id, temperature FROM temperature_control WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(batch_id) AS total_batches, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM temperature_control GROUP BY temperature ORDER BY avg_temp DESC;
SELECT batch_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_control WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM temperature_control WHERE batch_id IN (123, 456, 789) AND (temperature < 20 OR temperature > 30) ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM storage_temperature WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT drug_name, temperature FROM storage_temperature WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin'
SELECT id, drug_name, temperature FROM storage_temperature ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM storage_temperature
SELECT drug_name, temperature FROM storage_temperature WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY drug_name ASC
SELECT * FROM storage_temperature WHERE temperature < 10 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT drug_name, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM storage_temperature GROUP BY drug_name ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC

SELECT drug_name, temperature, timestamp FROM storage_temperature JOIN temperature_logs ON storage_temperature.temperature = temperature_logs.temperature_record WHERE temperature > 15 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM storage_temperature
SELECT * FROM TemperatureReadings
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM TemperatureReadings
SELECT id, temperature, timestamp FROM TemperatureReadings
SELECT * FROM TemperatureReadings ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM TemperatureReadings WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM TemperatureReadings WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, temperature FROM TemperatureReadings WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, temperature FROM TemperatureReadings WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY temperature DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM TemperatureReadings WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT timestamp, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM TemperatureReadings GROUP BY timestamp ORDER BY max_temp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM TemperatureLog;
SELECT log_time, temperature FROM TemperatureLog ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, temperature FROM TemperatureLog WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureThresholds WHERE min_temperature < 20 AND max_temperature > 30;
SELECT location_name, capacity FROM StorageLocation ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureLog WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT log_id, temperature, device_name FROM TemperatureLog WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT tl.log_id, tl.temperature, tt.drug_name FROM TemperatureLog tl INNER JOIN TemperatureThresholds tt ON tl.temperature BETWEEN tt.min_temperature AND tt.max_temperature;
SELECT sl.location_name, sd.device_type FROM StorageLocation sl LEFT JOIN SensorDevices sd ON sl.location_id = sd.location_id;
SELECT * FROM SensorDevices ORDER BY device_type ASC, location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureSensor;
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM TemperatureSensor ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE storage_condition = 'Cool';
SELECT drug_name, storage_condition FROM Drug WHERE drug_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_level FROM TemperatureAlert ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureSensor ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT reading_id, temperature, timestamp FROM TemperatureReading WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT drug_name, storage_condition FROM Drug WHERE storage_condition = 'Cool';
SELECT inventory_id, quantity FROM DrugInventory WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_level FROM TemperatureAlert ORDER BY alert_level DESC, timestamp DESC;
